# summary

Summary of all prints by % of MarketCap

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/summary days sort
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| days | Number of days to look back | False | None |
| sort | Sort by `mc` (MarketCap), `float`, `sum`, or `short` (Short Percentage) | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/summary 10 mc
```

---
